name: SEVA- Social Education And Voluntary Action
briefDescription: Vision “A society where the most disadvantaged and deprived communities particularly dalits and women have strong organizations of their own, to have sustainable opportunities and live a decent life.” Policy‘SEVA’ functions in a truly democratic, decentralized and non-discriminative style and very conscious efforts are being made to develop similar functioning in case of all groups being promoted at the community level.It is formed to promote and enhance sustainable rural, tribal and urban development and to create opportunities to the vulnerable and disadvantage communities of the society. In order to enhance their socio-economic status, SEVA believes in the integrated approach, participatory planning, demonstrations, exposure vis
